title: Remainder Theorem Definition
text: The remainder theorem is as follows: if f(x) is being divided by $$(x-a)$$, then the remainder is equal to f(a). This means that we must plug in $$x=3$$ into our dividend.
speech: The remainder theorem is as follows: if f(x) is being divided by  times, parentheses x minus a,  , then the remainder is equal to f(a). This means that we must plug in  x is equal to 3  into our dividend.

, then the remainder is equal to f(a). This means that we must plug in   x is equal to 3

title: Plugging In
speech: 3 x cubed, plus 4 x squared, minus 8 x plus, 2  becomes  3 times 3 cubed plus 4 times 3 squared, minus 8 times 3 plus 2 . This simplifies to  95 .
pacedSpeech: 3 x cubed, plus 4 x squared, minus 8 x plus, 2
becomes   3 times 3 cubed plus 4 times 3 squared, minus 8 times 3 plus 2
